resources.string: The fully end to end encrypted messaging app that doesn’t fingerprint you or store any identifying information about you.
We’re generating a unique key on your device that will be used to encrypt all your outgoing messages and provide other users with a way to message you.
Make a copy of this key and keep it safe! We recommend writing it down on paper and keeping it in a locked safe. If you ever loose this you will loose access to all your messages.

This is the key you should share with other’s if you want them to be able to message you.
You can find this key under your profile
This will be the name that appears for other users
